subject: You Can do it also
body:
Do you have a telephone and can return calls?

If so call me now at 8OO.366.3827 to hear my message.

You can generate a great living for simply returning phone calls.

I know it sounds to good to be true but this is not a joke.

Call 8OO.366.3827

I look forward to hearing from you

Later
